main event: Gerald Ramer reported observing a small, disc-shaped or oval-shaped UFO near Homer, New York, on April 6, 1964.
interesting points: The UFO was described as circular, metallic, and glowing with intense white light., The object hovered silently before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from view., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The witness was a military veteran, known for reliability., Two others were present working on the farm and witnessed the object as well.
witness description: Gerald Ramer, military veteran, reliable observer
